name: User switch organization via CLI
description:
- Login with valid credentials via **UI**.
- Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.
- Login with Bearer auth token via **CLI**.
- Create first organization via **CLI**.
- Create second organization via **CLI**.

### Verify that:

- User can switch between organizations via **CLI**.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials via UI.
  • Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.
  • Login with Bearer auth token via CLI.
  • Create first organization via CLI.
  • Create second organization via CLI.

Verify that:

  • User can switch between organizations via CLI.
statusMessage:
AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Login to apolo CLI with access token
Message: ERROR: No clusters configured
statusTrace:
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:49: in wrapper
    result = await func(*args, **kwargs)
             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
tests/test_cases/steps/cli_steps/comonent_steps_impl/config_steps.py:26: in cli_login_with_token
    assert result, error_message
           ^^^^^^
E   AssertionError: ERROR: No clusters configured

The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:
tests/test_cases/tests_cli/test_organization_structure_setup.py:140: in test_switch_org_cli
    await self._cli_steps.config.cli_login_with_token(token=user.token)
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:58: in wrapper
    raise AssertionError(formatted_msg) from e
E   AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Login to apolo CLI with access token
E   Message: ERROR: No clusters configured
